snippet: Several Long Island winemakers with Italian backgrounds who make their own pizzas said they favored reds, some pricey.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column suggests dry red wines to accompany pizza (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Several Long Island winemakers with Italian backgrounds who make their own pizzas said they favored reds, some pricey.

headline.seo: Long Island Vintners Choose Their Favorite Pizza Wines
headline.main: Dry Reds to Pair With Pizza
headline.print_headline: Dry Reds to Pair With Pizza
